name: iOS widgets page
description:
Recreated the widgets page on my phone from scratch. Used Auto-layout and some plugins for icons and images. Fun exercise. Duplicate the file and try for yourself using the reference images.


Checkout the prototype here : https://www.figma.com/proto/YDyerdhVlmWvAF37KZNyGN/iOS-widgets-page?node-id=3%3A7&viewport=-1694%2C103%2C0.26692014932632446&scaling=scale-down
